class_notes: This class will meet synchronously MW, with the fourth hour of coursework to be completed asynchronously prior to the next Monday meeting time.
course_description: Prerequisite: RUSS 201 or consent of instructor. Continuation of 201 -  Focus on more advanced grammatical and syntactical constructions both in written and spoken Russian. Supplemented by multimedia exercises and materials.
sections: Class Nbr: 3591, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: V. Proskurina, Status: Open
